Olivia Barash (amuru Jenụwarị 11, 1965) bụ onye omere America
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya dị ka nwata na-eme ihe nkiri, na-apụta na usoro telivishọn dị ka obere ụlọ na Prairie, Charlie's Angels, na Ncha
O mechara bụrụ onye ndu na sitcom dị mkpụmkpụ na mmalite, nke ewepụtara na 1978
O nwekwara onye ndu na ihe nkiri telivishọn Walt Disney Child of Glass (1978)

Dị ka onye toro eto, Barash kwadoro onwe ya n'ịkwado ọrụ ihe nkiri na Repo Man (1984), Tuff Turf (1985), Patty Hearst (1988), na Floundering (1994).
Olivia Barash (amuru Jenụwarị 11, 1965) bụ onye omere America
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya dị ka nwata na-eme ihe nkiri, na-apụta na usoro telivishọn dị ka obere ụlọ na Prairie, Charlie's Angels, na Ncha
O mechara bụrụ onye ndu na sitcom dị mkpụmkpụ na mmalite, nke ewepụtara na 1978
O nwekwara onye ndu na ihe nkiri telivishọn Walt Disney Child of Glass (1978)
Dị ka onye toro eto, Barash kwadoro onwe ya n'ịkwado ọrụ ihe nkiri na Repo Man (1984), Tuff Turf (1985), Patty Hearst (1988), na Floundering (1994).
A mụrụ Barash na Jenụwarị 11, 1965 na Miami, Florida
A zụlitere Barash na New York City, wee malite ịrụ ọrụ ọkachamara mgbe ọ dị afọ 11
N'oge ọ bụ nwata ọ na-eme ihe nkiri, ịbụ abụ na ịgba egwu na egwu egwu ama ama na New York, ọ gbara ya dị ka "Baby June" na Gypsy ya na Angela Lansbury
Ọ bụ nwa mbụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri meriri na New York Critic's Circle Award
N'ịkwaga Hollywood mgbe ya na ezinụlọ ya dị afọ iri na ụma, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Palisades na Pacific Palisades, California wee gụchaa na 1982.
Barash pụtara na ihe nkiri ndị na efe ụgbọ elu nke The Incredible Hulk, na-eme ihe nkiri "nwa agbọghọ ifuru" a ma ama sitere na Frankenstein James Whale
N'ụdị a, ọ na-eme enyi ndị Hulk, mana nna dinta na-eme ka enyi ha dị mkpụmkpụ, bụ onye ji égbè gbapụ Hulk ahụ, na-eme ka Hulk tụba ya ọtụtụ narị ụkwụ n'ime ọdọ mmiri dị nso

Barash pụtakwara dị ka ọbịa na akụkụ abụọ nke Mary Hartman, Mary Hartman na 1977, na na 1978, etinyere ya na isi ọrụ na sitcom Na mmalite, nke soro onye ụkọchukwu Katọlik na-adịghị agbanwe agbanwe na onye na-emesapụ aka, onye nọn na-ahụ maka ọha na eze na-agba ọsọ
ozi na Baltimore ; usoro ahụ gbara naanị nkeji ise na CBS, ọ bụ ezie na a na-esere ngụkọta nke itoolu tupu a kagbuo usoro ahụ
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ gbara egwu na ihe nkiri telivishọn Walt Disney bụ Child of Glass, bụ nke o gosipụtara mmụọ nke nwa agbọghọ na-eto eto gburu n'oge Antebellum
Na 1984, Barash pụtara na Repo Man, nke o nwere ọrụ nkwado na-egwu ndị òtù UFO
N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ pụtara n'ihu James Spader na Kim Richards na ihe nkiri ntorobịa Tuff Turf (1985)
Na 1987, Barash nwere ọrụ nkwado bụ isi na usoro telivishọn Fame, na-egwu Maxie Sharp
Na 1988, o nwere ọrụ nkwado na Paul Schrader 's biopic Patty Hearst
Na 2013, o kpughere atụmatụ iduzi na imepụta Fallout Entertainment: Enyi nke Viper Room
Ọrụ a sitere na akaụntụ ya na ahụmịhe ya sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na klọb Los Angeles The Viper Room laa azụ n'oge ọmarịcha ya na etiti 1990s
